00015 TEST(KnowledgeTest, getEncodeTypeDefault) {
00016     Knowledge* knowledge = new JMA_Knowledge;
00017 
00018     ASSERT_TRUE(knowledge);
00019 
00020     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM, knowledge->getEncodeType()) << "default encode type should be invalid type";
00021 
00022     delete knowledge;
00023 }

00025 TEST(KnowledgeTest, decodeEncodeType) {
00026     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("UTF-8"));
00027     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("UTF8"));
00028     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("utf-8"));
00029     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("utf8"));
00030     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("EUCJP"));
00031     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("EUC-JP"));
00032     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("eucjp"));
00033     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("euc-jp"));
00034     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("SJIS"));
00035     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("SHIFT-JIS"));
00036     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("sjis"));
00037     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("shift-jis"));
00038 
00039     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(""));
00040     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("GB2312"));
00041     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType("EUCKR"));
00042 }
00043 
00044 TEST(KnowledgeTest, encodeStr) {
00045     EXPECT_STREQ("UTF-8", Knowledge::encodeStr(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8));
00046     EXPECT_STREQ("EUC-JP", Knowledge::encodeStr(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP));
00047     EXPECT_STREQ("SHIFT-JIS", Knowledge::encodeStr(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS));
00048 
00049     EXPECT_STREQ(NULL, Knowledge::encodeStr(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM));
00050 }
